creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
text: This embroidered silk panel, mounted as a hanging scroll, depicts three Daoist gods. Lu, the God of Wealth, stands in the center with Shou, the God of Longevity, on his left and Fu, the God of Happiness, on his right. The three attendants carry symbolic items: a ruyi scepter (symbolizing good fortune and happiness), a halberd and seal (symbolizing official position), and a piece of coral (symbolizing riches).
title: Hanging Representing Three Daoist Gods
